domainAliases

protected java.util.Vector domainAliases
One String for each domain alias for this WebServer.

Domain alias = DNS name by which this server can be accessed over the web, e.g. "www.yahoo.com" and "www.yahooisgreat.com" can point to the same server

MUST be at least one, and MUST be correct in order for cookies to work properly
